text: Verbin Sutherland (born 10 November 1966) is a Saint Vincent and the Grenadines former international footballer, who played in midfield. == Biography == === National team === Verbin Sutherland played for the Saint Vincent and the Grenadines national football team between 1992 and 2000. Verbin Sutherland at national-football-teams.com He took part in the 1996 Gold Cup in the United States. He played in two matches in the competition: against Mexico and Guatemala. He also took part in 1994 FIFA World Cup qualification, 1998 FIFA World Cup qualification, and 2002 FIFA World Cup qualification.Verbin Sutherland at 'fifa.com == References == Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Saint Vincent and the Grenadines international footballers Category:Saint Vincent and the Grenadines footballers
title: Verbin Sutherland
